sentence.Network_en: Verily I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我实在告诉你们，你们中间有一个人要卖我了。

sentence.Network_en: And he said unto him, "Who is my neighbor?"
sentence.Network_cn: 他于是对他说道：“谁是我邻居？”

sentence.Network_en: I will do unto others what they did to me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我会以其人之道还治其人之身。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... until 直到 unto 至;到 untouched 未提及的.
until 直到unto 至;到untouched 未提及的

Luke 2 : 20 says , " And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them . "路加福音2：20说：“牧羊的人回去了。因所听见所看见的一切事，正如天使向他们所说的，就归荣耀与神，赞美他。
and before the throne there was a sea of glass like unto crystal : and thethe throne and round the throne , were four beasts full of eyes before and behind .宝座前好像一个玻璃海如同水晶宝座中、和宝座周围有四个活物、前后遍体都满了眼睛。

list.abs: And Abraham said unto God , O that Ishmael might live before thee !, 18 亚伯拉罕对神说 , 但愿以实玛利活在你面前.
Sinograma « 给 » - Diccionario de Sinogramas ... 拨给[ authorize] 赐给[ give unto] 发给[ deal;distribute;deliver].

and the LORD said unto Moses , Say unto Aaron , Stretch out thy rod , and smite the dust of the land , that it may become lice throughout all the land of Egypt .耶和华吩咐摩西说，你对亚伦说，伸出你的杖击打地上的尘土，使尘土在埃及遍地变作虱子（或作虼蚤下同)。

at his day thou shalt give him his hire , neither shall the sun go down upon it ; for he is poor and setteth his heart it : lest he cry against thee unto the LORD and it be sin unto thee .要当日给他工价、不可等到日落、因为他穷苦、把心放在工价上、恐怕他因你求告耶和华、罪便归你了。
and he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .他说，阿爸，父阿，在你凡事都能。求你将这杯撤去。然而不要从我的意思，只要从你的意思。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from until, with to replacing till (in its northern dialect meaning 'to')

entry.def: Unto was used to indicate that something was done or given to someone.

example.ex: And he said unto him, 'Who is my neighbor?'...
example.tran: 他于是对他说道：“谁是我邻居？”

example.ex: I will do unto others what they did to me.
example.tran: 我会以其人之道还治其人之身。

entry.def: Unto was used to indicate that something continued until a particular time.

example.ex: Be ye faithful unto the end.

auth_sentence.content: Bind the brestplate...unto the rings...with a lace of blewe.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bind the brestplate...unto the rings...with a lace of blewe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bind the brestplate...unto the rings...with a lace of blewe.

auth_sentence.content: Sufficient unto the moment is the appearance of reality.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sufficient unto the moment is the appearance of reality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sufficient unto the moment is the appearance of reality.

auth_sentence.content: The Prophets...who saw not God apparently like unto Moyses.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Prophets...who saw not God apparently like unto Moyses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Prophets...who saw not God apparently like unto Moyses.

sentences.en: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you.
No matter how high one’s position,he must never be a law unto himself.
sentences.cn: 无论一个人的职位有多高,都绝对不能独断专行。
